b'Tamala 2010: A Punk Cat in Space OVA': b'After a long 5-year wait, the team that created the widely acclaimed "TAMALA2010 A Punk Cat in Space" (Winner of the Jury and Public\'s Prize for Best Animated Feature Film in Canada\'s FanTasia 2003), brings you a fusion of extremely cute graphics and nice music. Also included are 3 shorts directed by Studio 4C\'s Hidekazu Ohara. It\'s a new animation world you\'d want to see and listen to again and again.\n\n(Source: AniDB)'
